original_title: Crawling From the Wreckage: Dave Edmunds Live at the Capitol Theater
overview: Dave Edmunds --"The Welsh Wizard" - leads his crack band through rocking selections from throughout his storied career. Recorded live at the Capitol Theater in Passaic, New Jersey. Tracks include: "Crawling From The Wreckage", "Fine, Fine, Fine", "I Hear You Knocking" and more.
title: Crawling From the Wreckage: Dave Edmunds Live at the Capitol Theater
